title: Touching Fate
description: Aster Layne believes in physics, not psychics. A tarot card reading on the Ocean City Boardwalk should have been a ridiculous, just-for-fun thing. It wasn’t. Aster discovers she has a very unscientific gift—with a simple touch of the cards, she can change a person’s fate.Reese Van Buren is cursed. Like the kind of old-school, centuries-old curse that runs in royal families. Every firstborn son is doomed to die on his eighteenth birthday—and Reese’s is coming up fast. Bummer. He tries to distract himself from his inevitable death…only to find the one person who can save him.Aster doesn’t know that the hot Dutch guy she’s just met needs her help–or that he’s about to die.But worst of all…she doesn’t know that her new gift comes with dark, dark consequences that can harm everyone she loves.
author: Brenda Drake
